name: Twilight_Coat of Arms
description:
The project is called Twilight - Coat of Arms. (v.9.1) 

Testing Android port.

Fixing WASD controls. (coin sound glitch in WebGL)

[Controls]

Joystick (mouse click + drag)

Spacebar = Jump

Climb Up = W

Climb Down = S

[Still in Development]

It is a medieval retro style platformer that is inspired by games from my past. This project is based on character progression as you move through increasingly challenging levels.  Along the way you'll slay enemies and acquire coins, gems, powerups to enhance your character. 

At various stages you will be able to visit shops (Bazaars) to purchase upgrades, new characters (new abilities) etc. as you continue to progress through the levels.

Currently to kill enemies you simply jump on them but be careful because they can hurt you.

I hope you enjoy and I'd appreciate any feedback.  Thanks for checking out my game!

[In Progress]
Attack animations  (melee, fireball etc). are in finishing stages.

Boss encounters

New Levels

and much more!

[Current Bugs on roadmap]

coins resetting, 0 lives restart screen to resetting player UI, ladders are not functioning properly, knock/hurtForce not pushing player back
